author: ozeigermann
msg: Augmented WCK reference implementation to support macro store

author: ozeigermann
msg: Updated to 2.2pre1 to make build work again

author: ozeigermann
msg: Augmented recursive move to allow moving of a single file
and added recursive copy in the same fashion

author: ozeigermann
msg: When configured store supports the MacroStore interface
will forward the request to the store level. ExtendedStore will invalidate
caches of delete and moved resources.
- Add real check if move/copy/delete is inside a single store

author: ozeigermann
msg: - Added check for global cache to avoid NPE when not enabled
- Fixed depruning as it seemed to add the original key all the time
